#####

### `observium::snmp`

Class: observium::snmp

Sets up SNMP locally to permit monitoring of local host out of the box.

### `observium::yum`

Looksup required yum repos from hiera and sends them to the yum puppet module to be created.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include observium::yum
```
